summary: A strikingly beautiful young woman is raised from birth to be a deadly instrument of revenge against the swindlers who destroyed her family.
cast: Meiko Kaji|Toshio Kurosawa|Masaaki Daimon|Miyoko Akaza|Shinichi Uchida|Takeo Chii|Noboru Nakaya|Yoshiko Nakada|Akemi Negishi|Kaoru Kusuda|Sanae Nakahara|Hôsei Komatsu|Makoto Matsuzaki|Hiroshi Hasegawa|Takehiko Ono|Hitoshi Takagi|Mayumi Maemura|Kenji Ôkura|Ichiro Kijima|Shôichi Hirose|Kai Atô|Eiji Okada|Kô Nishimura
title: Shurayukihime
